name: categoriesBuilder
desc:
List of categories that the user can select.
If this is null no categories will be shown.

name: categoryButtonBuilder
desc: Abilty to override the standard category selector

name: categorySelectorHorizontalPadding
desc: Overides the standard horizontal padding of the whole category selector.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: initialFilterWord
desc:
Set a value to search through posts. When set the searchbar is shown.
If null no searchbar is shown.

name: allowAllDeletion
desc:
Allow all posts to be deleted instead of
only the posts of the current user

name: anonymousAvatarBuilder
desc:
When the imageUrl is null this anonymousAvatarBuilder will be used
You can use it to display a default avatarW

name: categoriesOptions
desc: Options for using the category selector.

name: dateFormat
desc: The format to display the post date in

name: dividerBuilder
desc: The builder for the divider

name: doubleTapTolike
desc: Whether to allow double tap to like

name: filterOptions
desc: Options for filtering

name: iconSize
desc: Size of icons like the comment and like icons. Dafualts to 26

name: iconsWithValues
desc: Whether to display the icons with values

name: imagePickerConfig
desc:
ImagePickerConfig can be used to define the
size and quality for the uploaded image.

name: imagePickerTheme
desc:
ImagePickerTheme can be used to change the UI of the
Image Picker Widget to change the text/icons to your liking.

name: itemInfoBuilder
desc: The builder for the item info, all below the like and comment buttons

name: likeAndDislikeIconsForDoubleTap
desc: The icons to display when double tap to like is enabled

name: padding
desc: The padding between posts in the timeline

name: postPadding
desc: Padding of each post

name: postWidgetHeight
desc: Sets a predefined height for the postWidget.

name: sortCommentsAscending
desc: Whether to sort comments ascending or descending

name: sortPostsAscending
desc: Whether to sort posts ascending or descending

name: theme
desc: Theming options for the timeline

name: timeFormat
desc: The format to display the post time in

name: timelinePostHeight
desc: The height of a post in the timeline

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onPostCreated
desc: called when the post is created

name: options
desc: The options for the timeline

name: service
desc: The service to use for creating the post

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: onUserTap
desc: If this is not null, the user can tap on the user avatar or name

name: options
desc: Options to configure the timeline screens

name: post
desc: The post to show

name: service
desc: The timeline service to fetch the post details

name: userId
desc: The user id of the current user

desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onTap
desc: Optional max height of the post

name: onUserTap
desc: If this is not null, the user can tap on the user avatar or name

name: userId
desc: The user id of the current user

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: filterEnabled
desc: if true the filter textfield is enabled.

name: onPostTap
desc: Called when a post is tapped

name: onUserTap
desc: If this is not null, the user can tap on the user avatar or name

name: options
desc: All the configuration options for the timelinescreens and widgets

name: postWidgetBuilder
desc: Override the standard postwidget

name: posts
desc:
This is used if you want to pass in a list of posts instead
of fetching them from the service

name: scrollController
desc: The controller for the scroll view

name: service
desc: The service to use for fetching and manipulating posts

name: timelineCategory
desc: The string to filter the timeline by category

name: userId
desc: The user id of the current user

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: TimelineTextStyles
desc:
Options to update all the texts in the timeline view
with different textstyles

name: categorySelectionDescriptionStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the category explainer on the selection page

name: categorySelectionTitleStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the category items in the list on the selection page

name: deletePostStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the deletion text that shows in the popupmenu

name: errorTextStyle
desc: The TextStyle for all error texts

name: listCreatorNameStyle
desc:
The TextStyle for the creatorname at the bottom of the card
when it is in the list

name: listPostCreatorTitleStyle
desc:
The TextStyle for the creatorname at the top of the card
when it is in the list

name: listPostLikeTitleAndAmount
desc:
The TextStyle for the amount of like and name of the likes at
the bottom of the card when it is in the list

name: listPostTitleStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the post title when it is in the list

name: noPostsStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the text when there are no posts

name: postCreatedAtStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the creation time of the post

name: postCreatorNameStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the creatorname at the bottom of the post page

name: postCreatorTitleStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the creatorname at the top of the post page

name: postLikeTitleAndAmount
desc:
The TextStyle for the amount of likes and name of the likes
on the post page

name: postTitleStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the title of the post on the post page

name: viewPostStyle
desc: The TextStyle for the text indicating that you can view a post

name: commentIcon
desc: The icon to display to indicate that a post has comments enabled

name: deleteIcon
desc: The icon for delete action (delete post)

name: likeIcon
desc: The icon to display when the post is not yet liked

name: likedIcon
desc: The icon to display when the post is liked

name: moreIcon
desc: The icon for more actions (open delete menu)

name: sendIcon
desc: The icon to display to submit a comment
